price: 59. (Mûssa) alobi: Elaka na biso ekozala o mokolo mwa eyenga, mpe bato basangana na tongo.
arabic: قَالَ مَوۡعِدُكُمۡ يَوۡمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحۡشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحٗى

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla mawʿidukum yawmu al-zīnati wa-an yuḥ'shara al-nāsu ḍuḥan
